Name: Network
Description: A network of nodes that is trainable through training protocols.

Properties.Name: nodes
Properties.Description: A dictionary mapping ids to nodes. Contains all nodes including input and output

Properties.Name: inputNodes
Properties.Description: List of nodes sometimes used as imports to the network.

Properties.Name: outputNodes
Properties.Description: List of nodes sometimes taken as outputs of the network.

Functions.Name: addNodes

MandatoryArgs.Name: nodes
MandatoryArgs.Description: A list of nodes to add to the network.

Functions.Description: Adds the given nodes the Nodes property. This may change Node ID's if there is a collision.

Functions.Name: addInputNodes

MandatoryArgs.Name: Nodes
MandatoryArgs.Description: A list of nodes to add to the network.

Functions.Description: Adds the given nodes the Nodes property as well as the InputNodesProperty. This may change Node ID's if there is a collision.

Functions.Name: addOutputNodes

MandatoryArgs.Name: Nodes
MandatoryArgs.Description: A list of nodes to add to the network.

Functions.Description: Adds the given nodes the Nodes property as well as the OutputNodesProperty. This may change Node ID's if there is a collision.

Functions.Name: build

OptionalArgs.Name: seed
OptionalArgs.Description: Seed for all random trainable variables generated within the nodes.

Returns.Description: Seed for the network. This will be randomly assigned if a value is not given.

Functions.Description: Builds all nodes in the network starting from input nodes working down. If any nodes are not connected they will not be built.

Functions.Name: execute

MandatoryArgs.Name: inputs
MandatoryArgs.Description: Maps the IDs of input nodes to their value.

MandatoryArgs.Name: requestedOutputs
MandatoryArgs.Description: A list of nodes that you want to get the value of.

Returns.Description: Output of each node in requestedOutputs

Functions.Description: Uses the network to process the inputs into the required output. Only executes the nodes necessary to calculate the requested outputs.

Functions.Name: train

MandatoryArgs.Name: inputs
MandatoryArgs.Description: Maps the IDs of input nodes to their value.

MandatoryArgs.Name: trainingProtocol
MandatoryArgs.Description: The training protocol used to update the trainable parameters.

MandatoryArgs.Name: getErrorArgs
MandatoryArgs.Description: The list of arguments needed to compute the error. What's in this depends on the training protocol used.

Functions.Description: Updates the trainable perimeters of the network to minimize error.

Functions.Name: clear

OptionalArgs.Name: exceptionNodes
OptionalArgs.Descriptions: IDs of Nodes not to clear.

Functions.Description: Clears the value of all nodes except for specified exceptions.

Functions.Name: protectedClear

OptionalArgs.Name: exceptionNodes
OptionalArgs.Descriptions: IDs of Nodes not to clear.

Functions.Description: Runs protectedClear on all nodes except specified exceptions.

Functions.Name: exportNetwork

MandatoryArgs.Name: networkPath
MandatoryArgs.Description: The relative path to save the network to.

Functions.Description: Saves a built network to a directory for later use.

Functions.Name: importNetwork

MandatoryArgs.Name: networkPath
MandatoryArgs.Description: The relative path to save the network to.

Functions.Description: Imports a network from a specified directory. This will create and connect the nodes as they were when the network was exported.
